White_Plains.Mamaroneck Public Library:
Mamaroneck Public Library is a public library located in Mamaroneck, New York.


== Address ==
The Mamaroneck Public Library District
136 Prospect Avenue
Mamaroneck, New York 10543


== History ==
The Mamaroneck Public Library was established in 1923 on the Boston Post Road. It remained there until 1927, when it was moved to a new building at 136 Prospect Avenue.
